name_EN.	shopkeeper
desc_EN.	A person who sells various goods and serves as the public face of the town. Adept at using firearms to prevent robbery. Since they have next to no ability to negotiate, a rigorous training period is required when they inherit a store.
name_EN.	shopkeeper
desc_EN.	A person who sells various goods and serves as the public face of the town. Adept at using firearms to prevent robbery. Since they have next to no ability to negotiate, a rigorous training period is required when they inherit a store.
name_EN.	shopkeeper
desc_EN.	A person who sells various goods and serves as the public face of the town. Adept at using firearms to prevent robbery. Since they have next to no ability to negotiate, a rigorous training period is required when they inherit a store.
